f-button.title: Button
f-button.description: Buttons allow users to perform an action or to initiate a new function.

variant.description: A combination of properties which creates various visual styles.

outline.description: Outline with no background fill (ghost button).

state.description: Indicate various degrees of emphasis of the action.

primary.description: Strong emphasis. Reserved for essential actions.

danger.description: Distructive actions and negative consequences. Eg: Delete, Remove, Destroy

warning.description: To indicate discouragement. Not always distructive.

shape.description: Use it based on the app's style.

curved.description: Has subtle curve on all 4 corners.

block.description: Has no corner radius. It takes the width of the parent.

loading.description: Indicates a loading state. Loader replaces the content button. Loading state doesn't change the width of the button.

label-wrap.description: Allows wrapping the button label upto 2 lines.

label.description: Allows wrapping the button label upto 2 lines.

icon-left.description: An icon on the left of the label of a button.

icon-right.description: An icon on the right of the label of a button.

counter.description: Enables a counter on right end of the button. It's used to show stats on the button.
